p:
Fig 2 shows the sensitivity of our parameter estimates to different annealing temperatures. When the temperature is varied, the expected value of R g,s in 2013 did not vary considerably, whereas the variance became smaller with lower temperature, indicating that the estimation was reliable (i.e., reproducible). Conversely, the shape of the posterior distribution for R g,s in 2012 was varied by taking lower temperature, reflecting a small number of infected individuals and limited identifiability to estimate Î²
g, s during the corresponding period. S1 Fig shows the limited convergence with annealing temperature 32 given 2012 data only (e.g. R[2.1] and R[2.2]).
